  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1936</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Suffering Animals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leidende Tiere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animaux de Souffrance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animais Sofrendo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animali Di Sofferenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να υποστεί τα ζώα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animales Sufridores</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for English students, where the students learn about issues of cruelty to animals and express their feelingsand opinion in a composition.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cruelty</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pets</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für englische 
Kursteilnehmer, in denen die Kursteilnehmer über Ausgaben der 
Grausamkeit zu den Tieren erlernen und ihre feelingsand Meinung in 
einem Aufbau ausdrücken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais, où les étudiants se renseignent sur des issues 
de cruauté aux animaux et expriment leur avis de feelingsand en 
composition.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses, onde os estudantes aprendem sobre introduções 
da crueldade aos animais e expressam sua opinião do feelingsand em 
uma composição.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli 
allievi inglesi, in cui gli allievi imparano circa le emissioni di 
crudeltà agli animali ed esprimono il loro parere del feelingsand in 
una composizione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές, όπου οι σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν για τα 
ζητήματα της σκληρότητας στα ζώα και εκφράζουν την άποψη 
feelingsand τους σε μια σύνθεση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses, donde los estudiantes aprenden sobre 
aplicaciones la crueldad a los animales y expresan su opinión del 
feelingsand en una composición.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
